comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Probably Joe Loomis, sprinter and high-jumper of the Chicago Athletic Association. See, for example, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40A10FD3D5C13738... and query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0F11F73E5B17738... The second article (from NYT of Jan 15, 1915), indicates that this was the first time he had appeared in New York.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq:  Thanks for the information here.  We'll include it in the description next time we update.
